description:
Have you ever wondered how some of the great and artistic images you've seen in art, marketing, games and websites were created? Odds are they were created with Photoshop filters.

Using Photoshop filters, this course teaches you how to create realistic looking textures and how to create artistic imagery that stands out in any website, video game, art piece, advertisement or other medium for designers and artists.

This course requires that you have Photoshop installed on your computer. A knowledge of Photoshop is helpful but not required to complete this course.

* This course uses Photoshop CS3
title: Using Photoshop Filters Master Course
